Section.name: About PITT
Section.description:
Priyadarshini Institute of Technology & Science (PITT) was established in 2007 is a self –financed institution under the aegis of Indira Educational Society. The college has a rich tradition of pursuing scholastic excellence and overall personal growth. The institute is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education, New Delhi and affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada.
B. Tech courses with the below-mentioned specialization are offered by the college at the undergraduate level

Specialization
Seats
B. Tech
Electronics & Communication Engineering
120
Computer Science and Engineering
Mechanical Engineering
Civil Engineering
Electrical and Electronics Engineering
60
Note: The college also offers the diploma course in all the specialization except in Computer Science and Engineering
